title: Christmas in the Mouse House
description: Carries EU Toy Safety Directive 'Unsuitable for children ages 0-3' warning logo. The combination of model house, story and wonderful heartwarming artwork from Maggie Kneen inspire creative play. This is an innovative new version of this popular lift the flap series. It is Christmas Eve, and Mr Mouse and his family return home after buying gifts. The children want to decorate the Christmas three, but the parents say there isn't time. Go on an interactive journey with the young mice: open doors and lift the flaps as they search in cupboards and behind cushions for little trinkets to adorn the tree. The perfect gift for children with inquisitive minds.
author: Hannah Wilson
